pr_title: Mark the Mac build as an allowed failure.

timeline.message:
Attempt to mark the Mac build as an allowed failure.

Closes #3208

timeline.bodyText: Note to self - the early access versions aren't run, so this "allow failures" has no effect.
timeline.author: tfmorris
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,10 +40,10 @@ jobs:
 #      script: mvn test
 #      after_success: mvn prepare-package -DskipTests=true
   allow_failures:
+    - os: osx
     - jdk: openjdk-ea

timeline.bodyText: This was our Java 14 test, so we should probably add a replacement to cover that.
timeline.author: tfmorris
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,10 +40,10 @@ jobs:
 #      script: mvn test
 #      after_success: mvn prepare-package -DskipTests=true
   allow_failures:
+    - os: osx
